mapper.select: SELECT et.`employee_id`,et.`employee_name`,et.`employee_sex`,et.`employee_tel`,ro.`role_name`,li.`limits_name`,li.`tittle` FROM employee_role er,employee_table et ,role ro,limits li,rolelimits rl WHERE er.`employee_id`=et.`employee_id` AND er.`role_id`=ro.`role_id` AND li.`limits_id`=rl.`limits_id` AND rl.`role_id`=ro.`role_id`
